 2011-04512011-03-25,  ,  LAB,  TC,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
SubjectAviation Occupational Health and Safety Regulations
PrecisAVIATION OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY REGULATIONS replace the Aviation Occupational Safety and Health Regulations in order to ensure consistency between the health and safety standards for federally regulated employers in the aviation sector, the Regulations and the Canadian Aviation Regulations. These measures will help ensure that those working on board aircraft and those working on the ground enjoy similar health and safety protection, recognizing that employees working on board aircraft have specific work conditions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2011-0087 Publication Date: 2011-04-13
